mapper.sql: A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.DDL_COL_ID, A.DDL_COL_PNM, A.DDL_COL_LNM, A.BF_DDL_COL_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.DDL_TBL_ID, A.DDL_TBL_PNM, A.COL_ORD, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL, A.PK_YN, A.PK_ORD, A.NONUL_YN, A.DEFLT_VAL, A.COL_UPD_YN, A.DATA_TYPE_UPD_YN, A.NONUL_UPD_YN, A.DEFLT_VAL_UPD_YN, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, DDL_COL_ID, DDL_COL_PNM, DDL_COL_LNM, BF_DDL_COL_PNM, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, DDL_TBL_ID, DDL_TBL_PNM, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL, COL_UPD_YN, DATA_TYPE_UPD_YN, NONUL_UPD_YN, DEFLT_VAL_UPD_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ddlColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bfDdlColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataTypeUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nonulUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defltValUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
RQST_DTL_SNO,
DDL_COL_ID,
DDL_COL_PNM,
DDL_COL_LNM,

RQST_DCD,

DDL_TBL_PNM,

DATA_TYPE,
DATA_LEN,
DATA_SCAL,
PK_YN,
PK_ORD,
NONUL_YN,
DEFLT_VAL,
COL_UPD_YN,
DATA_TYPE_UPD_YN,
NONUL_UPD_YN,
DEFLT_VAL_UPD_YN,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,

#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{dataTypeUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL
DDL_COL_ID = #{ddlColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_COL_PNM = #{ddlColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_COL_LNM = #{ddlColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BF_DDL_COL_PNM = #{bfDdlColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_TBL_ID = #{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_TBL_PNM = #{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_ORD = #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PK_YN = #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_ORD = #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NONUL_YN = #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFLT_VAL = #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_UPD_YN = #{colUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE_UPD_YN = #{dataTypeUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NONUL_UPD_YN = #{nonulUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFLT_VAL_UPD_YN = #{defltValUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL set DDL_COL_ID = #{ddlColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_COL_PNM = #{ddlColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_COL_LNM = #{ddlColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BF_DDL_COL_PNM = #{bfDdlColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_TBL_ID = #{ddlTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_TBL_PNM = #{ddlTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_ORD = #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PK_YN = #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_ORD = #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NONUL_YN = #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFLT_VAL = #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_UPD_YN = #{colUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE_UPD_YN = #{dataTypeUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NONUL_UPD_YN = #{nonulUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFLT_VAL_UPD_YN = #{defltValUpdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
--DDL 이관테이블 추가시 컬럼을 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, DDL_COL_ID, DDL_COL_PNM, DDL_COL_LNM, RQST_DCD , DDL_TBL_ID, DDL_TBL_PNM, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT B.RQST_NO, B.RQST_SNO , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ) + (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.DDL_COL_ID, C.DDL_COL_PNM, C.DDL_COL_LNM, B.RQST_DCD AS RQST_DCD , B.DDL_TBL_ID, B.DDL_TBL_PNM, C.COL_ORD, COALESCE(E.DATA_TYPE_NM, C.DATA_TYPE) AS DATA_TYPE , C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL, C.PK_YN, C.PK_ORD, C.NONUL_YN, C.DEFLT_VAL , C.OBJ_DESCN, C.OBJ_VERS, B.FRS_RQST_DTM, B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, NOW(), B.RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_DDL_TBL A JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B ON A.DDL_TBL_PNM = B.DDL_TBL_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL C ON A.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = B.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN (
) E ON D.DBMS_TYP_CD = E.DBMS_TYP_CD AND C.DATA_TYPE = E.LGC_DATA_TYPE AND COALESCE(C.DATA_LEN, -1) BETWEEN E.MIN_VAL AND E.MAX_VAL WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO, A.COL_ORD
mapper.update:
--등록유형 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (select case when A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' then 'D' else case when MAX(B.DDL_COL_ID) IS NULL then 'C' else 'U' end end from WAM_DDL_TSF_COL B inner join WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL C on C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID and C.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL D ON C.DDL_TBL_PNM = D.DDL_TBL_PNM
AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} where B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and B.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM AND B.DDL_COL_LNM = A.DDL_COL_LNM and D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

--컬럼 업데이트 여부 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL A SET COL_UPD_YN = 'Y' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND ( COALESCE(DATA_TYPE_UPD_YN, 'N') = 'Y' OR COALESCE(NONUL_UPD_YN, 'N') = 'Y' OR COALESCE(DEFLT_VAL_UPD_YN, 'N') = 'Y' )
mapper.insert:
--검증쿼리 : 변경사항 없을경우 (DTC00) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL D JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL F ON F.DDL_TBL_PNM = D.DDL_TBL_PNM AND F.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = D.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND F.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = D.TGT_DB_SCH_ID
JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_COL E ON D.DDL_TBL_ID = E.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND A.DDL_COL_PNM = E.DDL_COL_PNM AND A.DDL_COL_LNM = E.DDL_COL_LNM and COALESCE(A.COL_ORD , 0) = COALESCE(E.COL_ORD , 0) and COALESCE(A.DATA_TYPE , '_') = COALESCE(E.DATA_TYPE , '_') and COALESCE(A.DATA_LEN , 0) = COALESCE(E.DATA_LEN , 0) and COALESCE(A.DATA_SCAL , 0) = COALESCE(E.DATA_SCAL , 0) and COALESCE(A.PK_YN , '_') = COALESCE(E.PK_YN , '_') and COALESCE(A.PK_ORD , 0) = COALESCE(E.PK_ORD , 0) and COALESCE(A.NONUL_YN , '_') = COALESCE(E.NONUL_YN , '_') and COALESCE(A.DEFLT_VAL , '_') = COALESCE(E.DEFLT_VAL , '_') AND COALESCE(A.OBJ_DESCN , '_') = COALESCE(E.OBJ_DESCN , '_') )
mapper.sql: A.DDL_COL_PNM, A.DDL_COL_LNM, A.DDL_TBL_ID, A.COL_ORD, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL , A.PK_YN, A.PK_ORD, A.NONUL_YN, A.DEFLT_VAL, A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID , A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.update:
--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL A SET (DDL_COL_ID, DDL_TBL_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT D.DDL_COL_ID , C.DDL_TBL_ID , COALESCE(D.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , D.FRS_RQST_DTM , D.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL C ON B.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = C.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND B.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = C.TGT_DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID
JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_COL D ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM AND D.DDL_COL_LNM = A.DDL_COL_LNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL C ON B.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = C.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND B.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = C.TGT_DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID
JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_COL D ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM AND D.DDL_COL_LNM = A.DDL_COL_LNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... )

--테이블 ID 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL X SET (APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) = ( SELECT NOW(), A.APRV_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL A WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_COL A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL D ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND D.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID AND C.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM AND C.DDL_COL_LNM = A.DDL_COL_LNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND C.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_DDL_TSF_COL SELECT A.DDL_COL_ID , FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL A JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_DDL_TSF_COL A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID AND C.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM AND C.DDL_COL_LNM = A.DDL_COL_LNM AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: --WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_DDL_TSF_COL SELECT A.DDL_COL_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_COL A JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
